profileAlternative.name: Cris Haskell
profileAlternative.headline: Leveraging AI for CPG supply chain
profileAlternative.summary:
My entire career I've lived and breathed CPG, and here's a key insight I've learned over the course of two decades as an executive at global conglomerates, small businesses, and startups: Most consumer brands have no idea how to leverage data to drive their business and, in turn, their supply chain.

At Union Crate we're building an intelligent supply chain platform that helps CPG companies predict and in turn automate their entire supply chain. The products we offer use artificial intelligence to enable brands to automate daily operations and gain significantly higher accuracy demand forecasts.

As Chief Operating Officer, my ultimate goal is to help CPG brands realize lost sales on their P&L and improve working capital drivers on their balance sheet. I lead a team of CPG veterans, engineers, and data scientists who are obsessed with solving the core problems that weigh down a brand's supply chain and growth.

The results speak for themselves -- and please don't hesitate to reach out directly, as I'm eager to learn how our platform could help change how you run your business today and in the future.
